sentences.sContent: Can you tell us something about your experiences in Africa?
sentences.sContent_eng: Can you tell us something about your experiences in Africa?
sentences.sCn: 你能告诉我们一些有关你在非洲的经历吗？

sentences.sContent: Others flee up through Africa towards the Mediterranean Coast and then across the Mediterranean.
sentences.sContent_eng: Others flee up through Africa towards the Mediterranean Coast and then across the Mediterranean.
sentences.sCn: 有些人经由非洲北边逃离到地中海沿岸，再越过地中海。

sentences.sContent: I want us to be judged by the impact we have on the health of the people of Africa , and the health of women.
sentences.sContent_eng: I want us to be judged by the impact we have on the health of the people of Africa , and the health of women.
sentences.sCn: 特别是两组特别人群组。我希望以我们对非洲人民的健康，对妇女健康产生的影响来评价我们的工作。
